Product-name-0: GOBOULT (previously Boult) Mustang Torq 60Hrs Battery, Quad Mic ENC, Breathable LEDs Bluetooth (Yellow, True Wireless)
name: GOBOULT (previously Boult) Mustang Torq 60Hrs Battery, Quad Mic ENC, Breathable LEDs Bluetooth  (Yellow, True Wireless)
highlights: With Mic:YesBluetooth version: 5.4Wireless range: 10 mBoult X Mustang Collaboration: Experience the spirit of owning a Mustang as Form, Function and sound.Boult AMP App: Connect, control, customize seamlessly.60 Hours of Battery Life: Long-lasting power for uninterrupted use. Lightning Boult Fast Charging gives 10 mins charge = 120 mins of playtime.Dual device connectivity and Bluetooth 5.4 for seamless switching between devices.Quad Mic ENC: Crystal clear calls with advanced noise cancellation. 45ms Ultra-low latency and BoomX Technology with powerful 13mm drivers.Durable & Stylish: IPX5 water resistance, Breathable LEDs, and Touch controls. Proudly designed and manufactured in India.
description: Buckle up for an automotive journey with the GOBOULT Mustang Torq earbuds, a collaboration that brings the heart-pounding legacy of Ford Mustang to life in a pair of technologically advanced earbuds. Immerse yourself in custom Mustang-inspired UI promots as you fire up your earbuds, a subtle yet thrilling nod to the iconic pony car. Built to conquer marathons, not sprints, the GOBOULT Mustang Torq boasts a phenomenal 60 hours of total playtime with the charging case, ensuring you never get stranded without your soundtrack. Short on time? No problem. A quick 10-minute charge using the universal USB-C connector fuels your earbuds with a whopping 100 minutes of playback, keeping you powered up for whatever the day throws your way. Ultra-low latency of 40ms keeps audio and visuals in perfect sync, giving you the edge you need to dominate. Proudly bearing the Made in India tag, the GOBOULT Mustang Torq blends cutting-edge tech with the spirit of innovation. Connection is effortless with Blink & Pair technology � simply open the case and your earbuds seamlessly connect to your device via Bluetooth 5.4, ensuring a stable and uninterrupted connection. Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC) powered by ZEN Quad-mic ENC technology ensures your voice cuts through the noise, delivering pristine audio quality during calls. Custom-designed 13mm drivers pump out powerful, detailed sound, while the proprietary BoomX technology elevates your audio with rich bass, clear highs, and a meticulously tuned soundstage, bringing your music, movies, and games to life. Flaunt your love for Mustang with customizable Mode Sync LEDs that pulsate to the rhythm of your music. The charging case boasts captivating LED lights that mimic the signature sequential taillights of the Mustang, a true testament to the car's timeless design. And to truly capture the essence of Mustang, the charging case echoes the sleek, powerful contours of the car, a design language that embodies the spirit of the open road and untamed power. The GOBOULT Mustang Torq - Ignite your passion for sound and heritage.
Warranty-0: 1 year warranty from the date of purchase

DUDAO U18PRO: Immerse Yourself in High-Fidelity Audio

Experience sound like never before with the DUDAO U18PRO earbuds. These innovative earbuds boast Hi-Res certification and an ultra-wide frequency range, delivering rich, natural audio that captures every detail.

Unleash the Power of LDAC:

Enjoy unparalleled wireless audio thanks to LDAC codec support. This advanced technology transmits three times more data compared to standard codecs, resulting in a truly immersive listening experience.

description: Buckle up for an automotive journey with the GOBOULT Mustang Torq earbuds, a collaboration that brings the heart-pounding legacy of Ford Mustang to life in a pair of technologically advanced earbuds. Short on time? No problem. Proudly bearing the Made in India tag, the GOBOULT Mustang Torq blends cutting-edge tech with the spirit of innovation. Flaunt your love for Mustang with customizable Mode Sync LEDs that pulsate to the rhythm of your music. The charging case boasts captivating LED lights that mimic the signature sequential taillights of the Mustang, a true testament to the car's timeless design. And to truly capture the essence of Mustang, the charging case echoes the sleek, powerful contours of the car, a design language that embodies the spirit of the open road and untamed power. description: Buckle up for an automotive journey with the GOBOULT Mustang Torq earbuds, a collaboration that brings the heart-pounding legacy of Ford Mustang to life in a pair of technologically advanced earbuds. Immerse yourself in custom Mustang-inspired UI promots as you fire up your earbuds, a subtle yet thrilling nod to the iconic pony car. Built to conquer marathons, not sprints, the GOBOULT Mustang Torq boasts a phenomenal 60 hours of total playtime with the charging case, ensuring you never get stranded without your soundtrack. Short on time? No problem. A quick 10-minute charge using the universal USB-C connector fuels your earbuds with a whopping 100 minutes of playback, keeping you powered up for whatever the day throws your way. Ultra-low latency of 40ms keeps audio and visuals in perfect sync, giving you the edge you need to dominate. Proudly bearing the Made in India tag, the GOBOULT Mustang Torq blends cutting-edge tech with the spirit of innovation. Connection is effortless with Blink & Pair technology � simply open the case and your earbuds seamlessly connect to your device via Bluetooth 5.4, ensuring a stable and uninterrupted connection. Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC) powered by ZEN Quad-mic ENC technology ensures your voice cuts through the noise, delivering pristine audio quality during calls. Custom-designed 13mm drivers pump out powerful, detailed sound, while the proprietary BoomX technology elevates your audio with rich bass, clear highs, and a meticulously tuned soundstage, bringing your music, movies, and games to life. Flaunt your love for Mustang with customizable Mode Sync LEDs that pulsate to the rhythm of your music. The charging case boasts captivating LED lights that mimic the signature sequential taillights of the Mustang, a true testament to the car's timeless design. And to truly capture the essence of Mustang, the charging case echoes the sleek, powerful contours of the car, a design language that embodies the spirit of the open road and untamed power. The GOBOULT Mustang Torq - Ignite your passion for sound and heritage.

description: Buckle up for an automotive journey with the GOBOULT Mustang Torq earbuds, a collaboration that brings the heart-pounding legacy of Ford Mustang to life in a pair of technologically advanced earbuds. Immerse yourself in custom Mustang-inspired UI promots as you fire up your earbuds, a subtle yet thrilling nod to the iconic pony car. Built to conquer marathons, not sprints, the GOBOULT Mustang Torq boasts a phenomenal 60 hours of total playtime with the charging case, ensuring you never get stranded without your soundtrack. Short on time? No problem. A quick 10-minute charge using the universal USB-C connector fuels your earbuds with a whopping 100 minutes of playback, keeping you powered up for whatever the day throws your way. Ultra-low latency of 40ms keeps audio and visuals in perfect sync, giving you the edge you need to dominate. Proudly bearing the Made in India tag, the GOBOULT Mustang Torq blends cutting-edge tech with the spirit of innovation. Connection is effortless with Blink & Pair technology � simply open the case and your earbuds seamlessly connect to your device via Bluetooth 5.4, ensuring a stable and uninterrupted connection. Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC) powered by ZEN Quad-mic ENC technology ensures your voice cuts through the noise, delivering pristine audio quality during calls. Custom-designed 13mm drivers pump out powerful, detailed sound, while the proprietary BoomX technology elevates your audio with rich bass, clear highs, and a meticulously tuned soundstage, bringing your music, movies, and games to life. Flaunt your love for Mustang with customizable Mode Sync LEDs that pulsate to the rhythm of your music. The charging case boasts captivating LED lights that mimic the signature sequential taillights of the Mustang, a true testament to the car's timeless design. And to truly capture the essence of Mustang, the charging case echoes the sleek, powerful contours of the car, a design language that embodies the spirit of the open road and untamed power. The GOBOULT Mustang Torq - Ignite your passion for sound and heritage.

description: Step into the future of wireless audio with the DwOTS 777 True Wireless Earbuds, designed for those who demand powerful sound, seamless connectivity, and cutting-edge noise cancellation. Featuring 50dB Hybrid ANC with Feedback + Feedforward ANC Mics, these earbuds block out distractions, letting you fully immerse in your music, movies, or calls. Need to stay aware of your surroundings? Transparency Mode keeps you connected to the world around you with a single tap. Equipped with Advanced 6 Mics and AI-ENC Technology, every call sounds crisp and clear, filtering out unwanted background noise for an uninterrupted experience. Whether you’re watching movies, rocking out, or enjoying balanced sound, the 3 EQ Modes (Cinematic | Rock | Normal) let you customize your listening experience. Bluetooth V5.3 ensures a fast, stable connection, while Hall Switch technology enables instant auto-connect as soon as you open the case. Built for all-day wear, the IPX5 water and sweat resistance makes them perfect for workouts and outdoor adventures, while the minimal transparent design adds a sleek, futuristic touch. Plus, with a built-in reset button, troubleshooting is effortless. Elevate every beat, every call, and every moment with the DwOTS 777—where innovation meets pure, uninterrupted sound.

description: Buckle up for an automotive journey with the GOBOULT Mustang Torq earbuds, a collaboration that brings the heart-pounding legacy of Ford Mustang to life in a pair of technologically advanced earbuds. Immerse yourself in custom Mustang-inspired UI promots as you fire up your earbuds, a subtle yet thrilling nod to the iconic pony car. Built to conquer marathons, not sprints, the GOBOULT Mustang Torq boasts a phenomenal 60 hours of total playtime with the charging case, ensuring you never get stranded without your soundtrack. Short on time? No problem. A quick 10-minute charge using the universal USB-C connector fuels your earbuds with a whopping 100 minutes of playback, keeping you powered up for whatever the day throws your way. Ultra-low latency of 40ms keeps audio and visuals in perfect sync, giving you the edge you need to dominate. Proudly bearing the Made in India tag, the GOBOULT Mustang Torq blends cutting-edge tech with the spirit of innovation. Connection is effortless with Blink & Pair technology � simply open the case and your earbuds seamlessly connect to your device via Bluetooth 5.4, ensuring a stable and uninterrupted connection. Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC) powered by ZEN Quad-mic ENC technology ensures your voice cuts through the noise, delivering pristine audio quality during calls. Custom-designed 13mm drivers pump out powerful, detailed sound, while the proprietary BoomX technology elevates your audio with rich bass, clear highs, and a meticulously tuned soundstage, bringing your music, movies, and games to life. Flaunt your love for Mustang with customizable Mode Sync LEDs that pulsate to the rhythm of your music. The charging case boasts captivating LED lights that mimic the signature sequential taillights of the Mustang, a true testament to the car's timeless design. And to truly capture the essence of Mustang, the charging case echoes the sleek, powerful contours of the car, a design language that embodies the spirit of the open road and untamed power. The GOBOULT Mustang Torq - Ignite your passion for sound and heritage.

description: Buckle up for an automotive journey with the GOBOULT Mustang Torq earbuds, a collaboration that brings the heart-pounding legacy of Ford Mustang to life in a pair of technologically advanced earbuds. Immerse yourself in custom Mustang-inspired UI promots as you fire up your earbuds, a subtle yet thrilling nod to the iconic pony car. Built to conquer marathons, not sprints, the GOBOULT Mustang Torq boasts a phenomenal 60 hours of total playtime with the charging case, ensuring you never get stranded without your soundtrack. Short on time? No problem. A quick 10-minute charge using the universal USB-C connector fuels your earbuds with a whopping 100 minutes of playback, keeping you powered up for whatever the day throws your way. Ultra-low latency of 40ms keeps audio and visuals in perfect sync, giving you the edge you need to dominate. Proudly bearing the Made in India tag, the GOBOULT Mustang Torq blends cutting-edge tech with the spirit of innovation. Connection is effortless with Blink & Pair technology � simply open the case and your earbuds seamlessly connect to your device via Bluetooth 5.4, ensuring a stable and uninterrupted connection. Environmental Noise Cancellation (ENC) powered by ZEN Quad-mic ENC technology ensures your voice cuts through the noise, delivering pristine audio quality during calls. Custom-designed 13mm drivers pump out powerful, detailed sound, while the proprietary BoomX technology elevates your audio with rich bass, clear highs, and a meticulously tuned soundstage, bringing your music, movies, and games to life. Flaunt your love for Mustang with customizable Mode Sync LEDs that pulsate to the rhythm of your music. The charging case boasts captivating LED lights that mimic the signature sequential taillights of the Mustang, a true testament to the car's timeless design. And to truly capture the essence of Mustang, the charging case echoes the sleek, powerful contours of the car, a design language that embodies the spirit of the open road and untamed power. The GOBOULT Mustang Torq - Ignite your passion for sound and heritage.
